alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 27 at 3:01AM PDT until October 28 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 to 31 expected. * WHERE...In Oregon, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon. In Washington, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington
